title: Data Engineer
description:
Data Engineer


Location: Hybrid in San Francisco


Role Overview:


Join a dynamic team within a prestigious investment firm, focused on developing and implementing a strategic data framework to enhance efficiency, standardize processes, and mitigate risks. The role involves maintaining data integrity, leading data utilization improvement initiatives, and creating custom applications.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Design, develop, and deploy web and data-driven applications using Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, & SQL.
  • Collaborate with teams to develop scalable data infrastructure.
  • Manage and optimize data pipelines, ensuring data quality and integrity.
  • Integrate diverse data sources, execute data transformations, and process data.
  • Create data visualization and reporting tools for business analytics.
  • Ensure data system scalability, performance, and reliability.
  • Develop RESTful API endpoints for front-end data access.
  • Foster company-wide adoption of BI & Analytics products through user-friendly data solutions.
  • Design Custom UIs for Business Operations teams for Metadata Maintenance.
  • Implement automated deployment & testing frameworks.
  • Manage time effectively and lead platform development initiatives.


Must Have:

  • Strong Python experience building and enhancing web applications and data solutions (7 years)
  • Custom ETL design, implementation, and maintenance (7 years)
  • Experience with schema design, star schema, and dimensional data modeling (7 years)
  • Experience working with institutional data and understanding the intricacies of data
  • Experience correlating data, curating data, finding exceptions in data, etc.
  • Strong SQL experience (7 years)
  • Strong understanding of REST API architecture
  • Experience with modern Frontend frameworks, preferably Angular or React
  • Strong communication skills
  • Willingness to learn Javascript (React)


Nice to Have:


  • Experience in private equity, finance, or trading environments
  • Experience with Talend, Tableau, Snowflake, Salesforce
  • Experience with caching technologies such as Redis and Memcached


Join us to be a vital contributor to the technological innovations and data intelligence initiatives of a leading investment firm, shaping the future of business strategies and solutions. Apply now to advance your career in a role that promises professional growth and technological impact.
